Reviews.Title: LOVE THIS PHONE
Reviews.Author: Just a gyrl
Reviews.Content: Mine is not exactly a prepaid phone, but I have had this phone for 5 months. It is by far the best phone I have ever had. Not only did I fall in love with android, but I fell in love with HTC. I was a little leary about getting a phone I knew nothing about, but I trusted my at&t; sales rep and bought it. I have had almost no problems with it. I have way to many pictures and text messages on it and it causes it to freeze up (which can be expected). I usually just restart it and it is fine. Every so often I go through and delete things to give it a little bit of a break lol. I have never loved a phone as much as I love this one. I have dropped it on my ceramic tile in my kitchen and bathroom and it didn't even have so much as a scratch on it. I also dropped it on my concrete steps in my garage and again nothing happened to it. I have to say if you are going to get a smart phone this is the one to get. That isn't even all!! It has an 8MP camera which is awesome and the color is so vibrant I can hardly stand looking or using anyone else's phone. I have to say this phone has me spoiled. When it comes time to upgrade I will get another HTC phone. Also if you lose your phone you can download an app called android lost from your computer to your phone. It will send you the last messages sent and received, phone calls, take a picture from your phone, send crazy loud "help me I'm lost" messages (the phone can be on silent and it still plays it loud), you can set the phone to lock up and notify you if a different sim card is inserted, and many more great things to find your phone. On top of all those things it gives you a gps location within 7 meters of where your phone is. Trust me it works. My phone was stolen and I used this app and it had an arrow directly on the house where the phone was. All of this is emailed to you and the person with your phone has no idea any of this is going on. Awesome phone I highly recommend it to everyone!!!

Reviews.Title: The HTC Inspire is UNinspiring
Reviews.Author: Marjorie Martinez "Marjie"
Reviews.Content: Last year I upgraded my AT&T; contract and opted for the HTC Inspire.  I was drawn in with it's wide screen and 8MP Camera.  I did have a couple of good months with the Inspire - but that was all - a couple of good months.After approximately my third month with this phone I was beyond frustrated with it's low battery capacity.  I would leave for work in the morning, and by the time lunch rolled around I was in the yellow (warning zone) with my battery.  Should I foolishly choose to not charge my phone at my desk, I would be riding the subway in the evening with a dead phone.  I was constantly looking for a place to charge my phone (and inevitably bought a portable battery charger).Approximately six months into ownership my phone (which resided safely in a case) would freeze for no reason.  I would try to reboot the phone to no avail and be forced to remove the battery cover.  This happened at least once a week.Finally, after a year of ownership the inevitable accident with this phone - which has left me with my old, reliable iPhone 3 to carry me through to the END of my AT&T; service, and away from the HTC.Save yourself the heartache and pain I've suffered over the past year or so and skip the HTC Inspire.

Reviews.Title: Is a nice used phone.
Reviews.Author: Carla Robinson
Reviews.Content: It will last until my next upgrade, but didn't realize it didn't come with an SD Memory cardwhich is needed to take pictures, videos and to view some apps.

Reviews.Title: STARTED HAVING PROBLEMS AFTER A FEW WEEKS
Reviews.Author: PLDAVIS
Reviews.Content: I ORDERED THIS PHONE AND WITHIN A FEW WEEKS STARTED HAVING PROBLEMS WITH IT. IT STARTED FREEZING UP AND I WOULD HAVE TO TURN IT OFF AND REMOVE THE BATTERY THEN PUT IT BACK TOGETHER TO GET IT TO UNFREEZE.I WOULD TRY TO TAKE A PHONE CALL AND IT WOULDNT LET ME ANSWER AND SOMETIMES I WOULD TRY TO MAKE A CALL AND THE PHONE WOULD JUST TURN OFF. I WOULDNT RECOMMEND THIS PHONE!!!

Reviews.Title: Great phone if you don't want to call people
Reviews.Author: A N
Reviews.Content: This phone is just terrible. I got it when I came back from Madagascar as it was recommended by the representative. Everything was fine for the first month or two, then I couldn't make it 8 hours without my phone dying. That number is now down to 5 hours, and it keeps diminishing. Mine even stopped charging and I swapped it out with ATT about 5 months ago,and it still doesn't work correctly. It freezes about 4 or 5 times a day, I can't make calls as it freezes when I call people. It's quite possibly the worst phone in existence.Bottom line:If you want a phone that doesn't freeze and can last through the day, don't get this phone.

Reviews.Title: Not too shabby
Reviews.Author: the average person
Reviews.Content: This phone surprisingly lasted me 1.5years, without a case, before I replaced it.  Replaceable battery is nice along with the micro sd slot so you can buy your own cheap memory (upto 32gb).  The camera and screen are decent for a last generation smartphone.  It'll run most apps out there because it has a decent amount of ram (768mb), but the processor is a single core 1ghz. The metal body makes this thing almost indestructible, as far as smartphones go at least.  With a screen protector on I've dropped this thing easily 100times (some rough nights), from as far as 4 feet up.  Its landed flat and on the edges against metal, concrete, tile....you name it.  No cracks yet. dents on the metal body but it still works great....ill miss it

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: Ms. Powell
Reviews.Content: I ordered this phone because I had recently bought a new phone & I dropped it in a cup of juice. Since I dropped my phone in juice I figured why not upgrade the phone I had & get a better one & that's when the HTC Inspire was found. I really do love this phone & you can do so many things. When I ordered this phone it was set at a great price, it was sent to my house fast, and when I opened the package it looked brand new. I am very happy with this phone and appreciative of the person who I ordered the phone from.

Reviews.Title: Good phone, but has a very low battery life.
Reviews.Author: Ken
Reviews.Content: Phone does everything that a smart phone could do. The only big downside to this phone is that it has an extremely low battery life. Only lasts around 4-6 hours when fully charged.

Reviews.Title: Excellent full-featured phone
Reviews.Author: Shawn E Crapo
Reviews.Content: The only complaint I have about this phone is that the flash is way too bright. I have frequently taken pictures of friends where they end up squinting due to the brightness of the flash. Other than that, everything is top notch. It's fast, responsive, and has plenty of power for games and other advanced apps.
